name: Line
description: The Line class represents a line in 3D space.

properties.name: Length
properties.description: Gets the length of the line.

properties.name: Direction
properties.description: Gets the direction of the line.

properties.name: Origin
properties.description: Gets the origin of the line.

properties.name: EndPoint
properties.description: Gets the end point of the line.

methods.name: CreateBound(XYZ, XYZ)
methods.description: Creates a bounded line between two points.

methods.name: CreateUnbound(XYZ, XYZ)
methods.description: Creates an unbounded line through a point in a direction.

methods.name: Intersect(Curve)
methods.description: Intersects the line with another curve.

methods.name: Project(XYZ)
methods.description: Projects a point onto the line.
